channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Dino Smash!: When Zeg floats away on a kite, Blaze must team up with Zeg's three sisters to rescue him! Meg, Peg, and Egg save Zeg! (S9, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Kico the Kittycorn: Every time a rainbow appears, a Kittycorn family gets their special baby Kittycorn! So when Gabby unboxes a baby Kittycorn, all the Gabby Cats help her take care of it. (S3, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Gargamel clones himself to capture all one hundred Smurfs in 'His Own Worst Enemy', and in 'Tree of Knowledge', the Smurfs unwittingly ask Dimwitty for advice when he gets stuck in a tree. (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Monkey goes looking for a star for Papa Smurf in 'Reaching for the Stars', then in 'The Dream Team', Handy puts together an A-team to get his jet pack back from Gargamel's hovel. (S3, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Francois and Cap'n Turbot become stranded on a remote island in 'Pups Save the Gliding Turbots', and then in 'Pups Save a Plane', Mayor Goodway's first flying lesson goes sideways.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Sid the Pirate and his First Mate Arrby cause trouble in 'Pups Save the Sunken Sloop', then in 'Pups Save a Wiggly Whale', the diving bell is stuck underwater, with Cap'n Turbot and Francois inside.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Big Red Chicken's magic makes everything wacky in 'Wonky Wishing Wand', then in 'Bip Bip's Big Show', Dora gets Bip Bip to his concert with Tico. (S1, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Kitty Cat Cam: When Gabby unboxes a new camera that takes silly pictures, CatRat uses it to lead Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats on a photographic scavenger hunt around the dollhouse! (S1, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Bowling; Swimming Lesson: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Cruise Ship Holiday; Holiday on the Sea: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Frog Prince: Holly accidentally turns Ben into a frog. With the help of her friends, Holly tries to turn Ben back into an elf but instead turns him into a bird and then a rabbit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's Elf and Fairy Party: Lucy celebrates her birthday with an Elf and Fairy party and Ben, Holly and friends are invited.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston To The Rescue: Out looking for Gaston, after banning him from the castle, the elves and fairies come across a speaking door which leads to the dwarf mine. Once in, they find they can't get out.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The King's Busy Day: Holly spends the day with King Thistle on his royal duties. King Thistle must launch an elf boat, judge a fairy fruit competition and make a speech at the festival.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Tiny Chef Show
channel.desc: Chef makes an energy snack for Henry in 'Fruit Chews', then in 'Opera Cake', Chef makes a cake for Ruby's concert. (S2, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The aliens' spaceship is not working properly in 'Pups Save Floating Friends', then in 'Pups Save a Satellite', a satellite is out of orbit and falling towards Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Adventure Caravan: Peppa and her family are on a caravan adventure and the first stop is The Biggest Potato in the World. When it starts to get foggy, they park up before another busy day. (S7, ep 25).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Larenzo Lion: Today, Mummy Pig and Peppa are at the zoo and meet Larenzo Lion who lives there! Larenzo shows Peppa his toy zoo, but he keeps misplacing his wooden animals in his two bedrooms.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Dinosaurs Alive!; Being Babies: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Cat's Cafe; Cushion Den: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Staying Up Late; New TV: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Indoor Adventure; Hot Dry Day: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Folk Music Band; Calling Kylie: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Acorn Day: It's autumn and the Elves and Nanny Plum are busy clearing up all the leaves. Suddenly the squirrels arrive with a mission to store acorns in the Great Elf Tree. Acorn Day has arrived.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Queen Bakes Cakes: A cake sale is organised to mend the magic school, but Queen Thistle is baking and no-one can eat her cakes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston's Visit: Gaston catches a cold when his cave has a leaky roof, so Holly invites him to stay at the Little Castle until it is fixed. But soon Gaston is taking over.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Submarine: Ben and Holly set out to rescue Redbeard the Elf Pirate's sunken treasure. Mr Elf steers the Elf Submarine to the bottom of the lake, but then they are gobbled up by Big Bad Barry.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Digger World: Mummy and Daddy Pig, Peppa and George have a wonderful day with Mr. Potato at Digger World.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Doll Hospital: When Peppa gets Teddy dirty jumping in muddy puddles, she goes to The Doll Hospital.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wendy Wolf's Birthday: Wendy Wolf's birthday is here and she has invited Peppa and friends around for a party.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: George's Wooly Hat: George has a new hat and Mummy Pig is determined that George doesn't get it muddy when visiting Grandpa and Granny Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses; Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married; Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A special spooky play is planned in 'Paddington and the Cursed Halloween Show', then in 'Paddington saves the Mooncake Festival', Taylor the lifeguard arrives in Windsor Gardens. (S3, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Taylor reveals its his birthday, but how can his friends make it special when they had no idea? It's Burn's Night and Mrs Bird teaches Paddington about a rare creature called a Wild Haggis.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington has an important job to do in 'Paddington's Earth Day Mission', then in 'Paddington's Special Spring Harvest Celebration', everyone enjoys bringing their own celebration along. (S3, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Who is Paddington's Special visitor that Jonathan and Judy have helped come from afar? // It's the last night of Hanukkah and Mr Gruber's Hanukkiah breaks before he can light the final candle.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses; Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married; Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save the PawPaws: Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with the Paw Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Popped Top: The top of Farmer's Al's silo has been knocked off, and he needs help saving his corn crop.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Windsor Ruby is missing in 'Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case!', then in 'Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe', the Browns set up a takeaway, but it's hard work! (S3, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A game between England and Peru causes 'Paddington's Football Dilemma', then in 'Paddington Has To Say Goodbye', it's time for Aunt Lucy to go home, but there's still one more adventure. (S3, ep 24).

channel.desc: Carlita the Ice Cream Truck!: Gabby unboxes an attachment that turns Carlita into an Ice Cream Truck! The only problem is.there's no ice cream! (S3, ep 12).

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Motorbiking; Sea Treasure: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger steals Farmer Al's super-powered seeds in 'Pups Plus a Plucky Chicken', then in 'Pups Save a Pet Show', there's a pet show where owners and their pets dress in matching outfits. (S11, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger is ready for a special day in 'Pups Save Helga and the Humsquatch', then in 'Pups Save the Missing Bone-Stone', the Museum has a brand-new exhibit - which goes missing. (S11, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Space Mission Blaze: When three of Blaze's friends get launched into outer space on out-of-control jetpacks, Astronauts Blaze and AJ must blast off to save them! (S8, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: The pups help Grandpa bowl a strike in 'The Crew Builds A Bowling Alley', then in 'The Crew Builds A Superbloom Path', a flower-friendly footpath saves the day. (S2, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Kit's on the case when a prairie dog is stung in 'The Case of the Scorpion's Sting', then in 'The Case of the Constant Dripping', something's making a noise that is bothering some birds. (S1, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale
channel.desc: The hamsters thwart Kendrick and Harry's attempts to squirrel-proof the bird feeder in 'Mission Ham-Possible', and then in 'Vac Attack!', a robovac gobbles up Harry's prized trading card. (S1, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Swiper find his duplicates for a picnic in 'Too Many Swipers', and in 'Bateo's Home Run', Dora helps Bateo get to the baseball game. (S2, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Browns go to the beach in 'Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins', then in 'Paddington's Life Guard Training', Paddington, Jonathan and Judy rescue Mr Brown with lifeguard Taylor's help. (S3, ep 7).

channel.desc: The Elf Farm: Holly goes with Ben and Mr Elf to the elf farm to collect an egg for the King's breakfast. While there, a huge chicken escapes from the farm and Holly and the elves have to chase it.

channel.desc: Gaston Goes to the Vet: Ben Elf and his parents are going on holiday in the elf truck but Gaston the Ladybird has swallowed the car keys.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Smurfette and Grouchy compete to decide who is the best in 'The Battle of the Sitters', and in 'Let's Smurf To Mars', Blossom dreams of going to Mars and can count on her friends to help. (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Handy has invented a machine that allows him to understand animals in 'What the bear said', then in 'Parallel Worlds', Clumsy and Dimwitty open up a portal with other worlds. (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta get trapped in 'Pups Save a Trophy', then in 'Pups Save the Wind Trekkers', Humdinger's mum Helga loses her son's phony trophy, and the Paw Patrol rescue her. (S9, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger creates fake emergencies in 'Pups Save the Kitty Rescue Crew', then in 'Pups Save an Ostrich', the Wingnuts get a new pet ostrich, but it gets lost on the trip home.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps the Troll untwist his tongue in 'Tongue Twisted Troll', then in 'Chompy and the Cloud Flower', Chompy chomped a rare seed and Dora finds a new one. (S2, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Dollhouse Detectives: When things start to mysteriously disappear around the dollhouse, Gabby and Pandy play detectives. (S2, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Miss Cookie's Nature Trail: Miss Cookie's class is out on a nature trail, in the Little Kingdom! It is up to Ben and Holly to prevent the elves and fairies being discovered.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Fun and Games: Ben and Holly are having fun playing in the meadow. Holly gets frustrated when Ben uses his elf skills to win all the games. Ben gets frustrated when Holly uses her magic skills.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Toy Robot: Out playing in the meadow, Holly, Ben and their friends find a broken toy robot. Holly fixes it with magic, but the robot does not behave as they thought it would.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: House Rules: While visiting Suzy and Emily's house, Peppa is surprised there are extra rules she doesn't have in her own house like no shoes indoors and no eating peanuts.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Big Announcement: Today is a special day because Mummy and Daddy Pig have big news to tell Peppa and George. However, Peppa and George struggle to wait patiently, so resort to playing games.

channel.desc: Redbeard's Rainbow: Rainbows are a pirate's best friend - if you're looking for a pot of gold. But, if like Captain Squid you are hiding treasure, then rainbows are a pirate's worst enemy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Trip To The Seaside: Holly joins Ben and his family on a trip to the seaside, and Mr Elf tells her that no magic is to be used. But when no one has remembered to pack lunch, they ask Holly to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Visiting The Marigolds: Everyone is visiting snooty King and Queen Marigold's Castle. King and Queen Marigold give them a tour, which is not without a few mishaps.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Fox Cubs: There is a new fox cub leader in The Little Kingdom - Nanny Plum. But whilst trying to earn their adventure badges the fox cubs find themselves stuck at the top of a mountain.

channel.desc: Canal Boat: It's Captain Daddy Dog's birthday and Mummy Dog surprises him with the gift of a boat trip, which isn't quite what he had expected.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig's Greenhouse: Grandpa Pig and Grandpa Dog are showing and sharing their lovely, tomato filled, Greenhouses to Peppa and George.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr Curry is sure there's a monster in the park lake in 'Paddington and the Lake Monster', and in 'Paddington's Space Radio', Toq wants to let her dad know she's thinking of him up in space. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps Mateo dress up in 'Paddington and the Three Musketeers', then in 'Paddington and the Dinosaur Hunt', Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt in the park. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr. Bull Digs Up The River: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George for a day on his boat. They see Mr. Bull, who's using his digger boat to remove all the rubbish in the river that shouldn't be there.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Camping Out: Holly is going on a camping trip with Ben and his mum and dad, but they are soon joined by annoying Mr Gnome, who is always hungry and sings silly songs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Fruit Harvest: It is harvest day. The Elves and fairies enlist the help of Mr Gnome in picking blackberries. If only they could stop him from eating them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's School: Holly and Ben spend a day at Lucy's school, whilst trying not to be spotted by Lucy's teacher, Miss Cookie.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Big Bad Barry: King Thistle wants fish for dinner, so he goes out fishing with Mr Elf, Ben and Holly on Mr Elf's boat. Mr Elf tells them a story about the biggest, baddest fish ever - Big Bad Barry.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Superheroes: The children are playing a game of superheroes. When Strawberry takes her supervillain role a bit too far, it is up to Elf Man and Fairy Girl to save the day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole in 'Pups Save Little Hairy', then in 'Pups Save a Kooky Climber', Daring Danny tries extreme rock climbing with Ace Sorenson. (S7, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Wingnut's junk pile and Oscar go missing at the same time in 'Pups Stop the Junk-Monster', then in 'Pups Save the Whale Pod', Francois accidentally crashes his diving bell. (S7, ep 25).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Baby Benny Box is Here!: Baby Box is getting a Box Baby brother. Gabby and Pandy go in the dollhouse to meet the new baby, Benny Box. Mama Box asks Gabby, Pandy, and Baby Box to babysit! (S3, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Dressing Up; Mummy Pig's Birthday: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Goldie The Fish; The Blackberry Bush: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Polly's Holiday; Swimming: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Ambulance: Dr. Brown Bear comes to visit the playgroup and teach all of the children what to do when there's been an accident.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig's Train To The Rescue: Miss Rabbit's train has broken down with a carriage full of passengers who need to get to work. Grandpa Pig lends Miss Rabbit his little train Gertrude.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: A silver ant is swept up by a sandstorm in 'The Search for the Silver Ant Hill', then in 'The Search for the Swamp Snapper', Sam and Kit visit the swamp to investigate a dinosaur sighting. (S1, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Smurfette and Grouchy compete to decide who is the best in 'The Battle of the Sitters', and in 'Let's Smurf To Mars', Blossom dreams of going to Mars and can count on her friends to help. (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora, Boots, and Benny trek through the rainforest to deliver a cake in 'Tres Leches Trouble', then in 'Wizzle Wozzle Woo', Dora and the Fiesta Trio investigate a loud, strange noise. (S1, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger hijacks Al's big rig in 'Pups Save the Swiped Stage', then in 'Pups Save the Big Big Pipes', Al's load of big pipes breaks loose. (S9, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Jake's family clock is sliding down a mountain with Chickaletta stuck inside in 'Pups Save a Cuckoo Clock', then in 'Pups Save Ms. Marjorie's House', mysterious holes are appearing all over the yard.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: Winter becomes wonderful with Rubble & Crew in 'The Crew Builds A Winter Wonderland', then in 'The Crew Builds A Giant Snow Squirrely Whirly', the pups learn to build with snow! (S2, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: The Yucky Ducky: When the Yucky Ducky covers Axle City in icky, sticky grossigoo, it's up to Special Mission Blaze to stop her machine and save the world from being grossified. forever! (S7, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: CatRat the Bandit: More friendly adventures in Gabby's Dollhouse. (S1, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The New Wand: Wandy gets a cold and is taken ill, Holly is given a replacement wand. This new wand can do lots of things that Wandy can't, and soon becomes the favourite.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's School: Holly and Ben spend a day at Lucy's school, whilst trying not to be spotted by Lucy's teacher, Miss Cookie.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: A silver ant is swept up by a sandstorm in 'The Search for the Silver Ant Hill', then in 'The Search for the Swamp Snapper', Sam and Kit visit the swamp to investigate a dinosaur sighting. (S1, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora, Boots, and Benny trek through the rainforest to deliver a cake in 'Tres Leches Trouble', then in 'Wizzle Wozzle Woo', Dora and the Fiesta Trio investigate a loud, strange noise. (S1, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Something's gone wrong on the swamp tour in 'Pups Save a Swamp Creature', then in 'Pups and the Hidden Golden Bones', everything is shaking and breaking beneath Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: What Babies Do: Peppa and her family are visiting Cousin Chloe's House to play with Baby Alexander. Peppa learns babies are not like dolls at all, and do lots of things every day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Lenses: Peppa hands Penny and Pedro the wrong glasses by mistake and they can't see very well. Madame Gazelle then tells them the importance of lenses and how they're in all sorts of things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Party Bus; Movie Night: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Art House Day; Wildflower Wood: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sunny Day Games; Magic Trick: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben's Birthday Card: Holly forgets Ben's birthday, and rushes home to make him a birthday card. But Nanny has stopped all magic, so Holly has to make the card herself.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Party: It's the twins' birthday party and chaos ensues when their little friends arrive. The Wise Old Elf tries to entertain them, but they turn him into a mouse.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston is Lost: Ben and Holly want to play with Gaston the ladybird but he is missing. Nanny Plum uses her magic crystal ball to find him, and discover his daily routine is not what they thought.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Books: Queen Thistle reads the children a story, which inspires a question. They can't find the answer in the magic books in the castle, so go instead to the Wise Old Elf in the Great Elf Library.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Molly Mole: It is Molly Mole's first day at school and she quickly makes best friends with Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Soft Play: It's Richard Rabbit's birthday party and George is invited, and that can only mean one thing; Soft Play.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Market: Peppa and family find some great things to buy from the market and even get a special gift from Mr. Fox's stall.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Castle: Mummy and Daddy Pig take Peppa and George to a castle to feast on medieval banquets, play King and Queen and even meet a dragon. It's George's favourite day ever.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Adventure Caravan; Caravan Friends; Chloe's Birthday Party; Broken Party Bus; Living Above the Shops; Roof Top Garden; Moving In; Everybody Sleepover!: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Chloe's Birthday Party; Broken Party Bus; Living Above the Shops; Roof Top Garden; Moving In; Everybody Sleepover!: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Browns go to the beach in 'Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins', then in 'Paddington's Life Guard Training', Paddington, Jonathan and Judy rescue Mr Brown with lifeguard Taylor's help. (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Something is making strange noises in 'Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery', and in 'Paddington and the Fossil Hunt', Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, but isn't having any luck. (S3, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington learns that seagulls love chips in 'Paddington vs the Seagulls', and in 'Paddington and the Light House', the lighthouse light is broken - can Paddington help save a boat at sea? (S3, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks Captain Green Beard's loot in 'Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt', then in 'Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper', everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition! (S3, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Adventure Caravan; Caravan Friends; Chloe's Birthday Party; Broken Party Bus; Living Above the Shops; Roof Top Garden; Moving In; Everybody Sleepover!: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save an Out of Control Mini Patrol: Alex and his Mini-Patrol accidentally take off on Daring Danny's rocket bike.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups and the Werepuppy!: Rocky goes missing at Uncle Otis's cabin, and the PAW Patrol needs to solve the mystery of the Werepuppy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Some pufflings get lost in 'Paddington's Puffling Rescue', then in 'Paddington Goes Under The Sea', Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonathan and Judy - but where is her necklace? (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The beach is a mess until 'Paddington's Beach Clean Up', then in 'Paddington's Holiday Farewell', the summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends. (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox in 'Pups Save a Jukebox', then in 'Pups Save a Mayor on a Wire', a hungry eagle causes Mayor Goodway's tightrope walking lesson to go wrong. (S9, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: We get wet in 'Pups Stop a Big Leak', there's fun in 'Pups Save a Baby Anteater', Ace helps in 'Pups Save a Hatch Day', and Mr Porter's truck gets stuck in 'Pups Save the Munchie Mobile'. (S8, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Calling Kylie; House Rules: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Igloo: It's a snowy day and Peppa's family build an igloo for their snowman. They then hide away in it during the snowstorm, but Penny Polar Bear and her parents love snowstorms and Peppa's igloo too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Bull is Getting Married: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup when everyone finds out that Mr Bull and Mrs Cow are going to get married the next day! (S7, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Big Red Chicken's magic makes everything wacky in 'Wonky Wishing Wand', then in 'Bip Bip's Big Show', Dora gets Bip Bip to his concert with Tico. (S1, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Scaredy discovers the forest in 'The Tour', and then in 'Smurfing a Masterpiece', Baby Smurf is the new Painter! (S3, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Mermaid Cruise Ship: All aboard the S.S. MerCat! It's time to go on a mermaid-tastic cruise with Gabby and Pandy, as they cruise to Mermaid Cove, where they see a special show! (S3, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Space Mission Blaze: When three of Blaze's friends get launched into outer space on out-of-control jetpacks, Astronauts Blaze and AJ must blast off to save them! (S8, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Zuma and Hurricane get swept off the beach in 'Pups Save the Mountain Surfers', then in 'Pups Save Humdinger's Home Away From Home', Mayor Humdinger takes his kitties for a holiday. (S11, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A sudden avalanche hits in 'Pups Get Your Goat', then in 'Pups Save the Crop Circles', Farmer Al finds mysterious crop circles in his corn field, and calls on the Paw Patrol to help. (S11, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Perfect Day: While Mummy Pig is enjoying a spa day out, Daddy, George and Peppa explore the rest of the shopping centre. (S5, ep 28).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Charity Shop: Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, Peppa and George decide to take all the things they don't use anymore to the charity shop, which raises money to help others.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Bat and Ball; Please and Thank You: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Potty Training; Lots of Muddy Puddles: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hoops; Detective Potato: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Games: Ben is in training for the elf games, Holly wants to join in but the rules state there is absolutely no flying or magic allowed. Ben gives Holly a chance to join in without using magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Dinner Party: Snooty King and Queen Marigold invite themselves round for dinner to King and Queen Thistle's castle to sample Nanny Plum's cooking. Nanny tries hard to cook special modern food.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Uncle Gaston: Three baby ladybirds, Amber, Emerald and Keith have come to stay at Uncle Gaston's for the day. The baby ladybirds are exhausting! So Ben and Holly help Gaston to keep them entertained.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle Is Not Well: King Thistle has a cold and needs medicine. Nanny Plum, Holly and Ben have fun collecting the ingredients for a magic potion to make him better.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's Birthday: King Thistle does not want to get any older so decides that no one must celebrate his birthday. But all of the Little Kingdom has been waiting to celebrate.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mrs. Witch's Spring Clean: Ben, Holly and Nanny Plum help Mrs Witch have a bit of a clear-out. The children bring the magical items back home, but in the wrong hands they cause a few problems.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A mixed-up delivery leads to chaos in 'Pups Save a Rocket Roller Skater', then in 'Pups Save Ryder's Surprise', Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped. (S7, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A dance contest goes wrong in 'Dancing with Luke Stars!', then in 'Pups Save a Mischievous Octopus', the pups investigate a mystery at an undersea museum exhibit, and discover an octopus! (S8, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Mermaid Cruise Ship: All aboard the S.S. MerCat! It's time to go on a mermaid-tastic cruise with Gabby and Pandy, as they cruise to Mermaid Cove, where they see a special show! (S3, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: New Shoes; Windy Castle: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Funfair; Pottery: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Teddy's Day Out; Nursery Rhymes: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Museum: The family visit a museum. Peppa likes the room with things from Kings and Queens of long ago. George loves the dinosaur room.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Pet Competition: There is a pet competition at playgroup, and everyone has brought in their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but finds it hard to choose the best pet.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The Stinkwell skunks help the duo find 'The Disappearing Dung Ball', then in 'The Search for the Spotted Frog', Nature ranger Wally Bunker joins Sam and Kit to look for a pet frog. (S1, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Hefty decides to take Timid under his wing in 'Curing Private Timid', and then in 'Smurfette Overdoes It!', Smurfette wears herself out, so Lazy teaches her the art of doing nothing. (S2, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Big Red Chicken's magic makes everything wacky in 'Wonky Wishing Wand', then in 'Bip Bip's Big Show', Dora gets Bip Bip to his concert with Tico. (S1, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Goodway's gesture of goodwill gift grows out of control in 'Pups Save a Giant Plant', then in 'Pups Get Stuck', Metal mayhem ensues when Marshall's Fire Truck becomes mysteriously magnetized.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Everest, the Turbots and a space rock get trapped in a cave in 'Pups Save a Space Rock', then in 'Pups Save a Good Mayor', Mayor Goodway goes missing and Mayor Humdinger causes havoc in Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups build the first hotel in town in 'The Crew Builds A Hotel', and then in 'The Crew Builds A Hiking Trail', the crew saves a duck birthday party. (S2, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: The Pillow Pirate: When a burgling buccaneer steals every pillow, it's up to Special Mission Blaze to save bedtime! Using the power of addition, can Blaze solve this pillow problem? (S7, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Kitty Fairy Gets Sick: When Kitty Fairy gets sick, Gabby, Pandy and the others get her to the garden. (S1, ep 25).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Big Bad Barry: King Thistle wants fish for dinner, so he goes out fishing with Mr Elf, Ben and Holly on Mr Elf's boat. Mr Elf tells them a story about the biggest, baddest fish ever - Big Bad Barry.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Superheroes: The children are playing a game of superheroes. When Strawberry takes her supervillain role a bit too far, it is up to Elf Man and Fairy Girl to save the day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The Stinkwell skunks help the duo find 'The Disappearing Dung Ball', then in 'The Search for the Spotted Frog', Nature ranger Wally Bunker joins Sam and Kit to look for a pet frog. (S1, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Big Red Chicken's magic makes everything wacky in 'Wonky Wishing Wand', then in 'Bip Bip's Big Show', Dora gets Bip Bip to his concert with Tico. (S1, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Rocky goes missing at Uncle Otis's cabin in 'Pups and the Werepuppy!', then in 'Pups Save a Sleepwalking Mayor', It's Cowboy Day, and Mayor Goodway faces the hazards of the ranch while sleepwalking.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick: Daddy Pig receives a jumping stick and tries to show how to use it, but finds it difficult. Peppa and her friends struggle too. But there's always jumping in muddy puddles! (S7, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Racquet Games: Miss Rabbit gives Peppa and friends a tennis lesson, but the tennis balls get everywhere! So, the children play badminton instead and it's a lot easier. (S7, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Caravan Friends; Chloe's Birthday Party: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Broken Party Bus; Living Above the Shops: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Roof Top Garden; Moving In: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Everybody Sleepover!; Walking Bus: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Happily Ever After; Singing Lesson: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny's Magic Test: Nanny's magic licence is out of date and in order to get a new one she must pass a test, set by the Wise Old Elf.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Chickens Ride West: King Thistle wants a boiled egg for his breakfast, so the elves decide to deliver the King the chickens from the Elf Farm so he can have an egg whenever he likes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Mermaid: Lucy and her dad are having a relaxing day boating on the lake. They fish out an old glittery mirror from the bottom of the lake, but it belongs to a mermaid who would like it back.
